body_html:
Could you monitor the memory consumption of the python process when attempting to do this; i might be looking at the wrong thing or looking at the right thing wrongly, because this will sound cuckoo-banana, but the code path looks like it is doing this copy in memory:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/gfile.py#L22
->
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py#L371
->
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.i#L113

body:
Could you monitor the memory consumption of the python process when attempting to do this; i might be looking at the wrong thing or looking at the right thing wrongly, because this will sound cuckoo-banana, but the code path looks like it is doing this copy in memory:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/gfile.py#L22
->
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py#L371
->
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.i#L113
